InstructionData.Title: Counter UI
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Counter UI # Model: UI-CNT-100 alias Counter d0 alias Inc1 d1 alias Inc10 d2 alias Dec1 d3 alias Dec10 d4 alias Reset d5
alias is_pushed r1 alias count r2 main: s Counter On 1
loop: yield bdns Inc1 skipinc1 l is_pushed Inc1 Setting bgtz is_pushed inc1 skipinc1: bdns Inc10 skipinc10 l is_pushed Inc10 Setting bgtz is_pushed inc10 skipinc10: bdns Dec1 skipdec1 l is_pushed Dec1 Setting bgtz is_pushed dec1 skipdec1: bdns Dec10 skipdec10 l is_pushed Dec10 Setting bgtz is_pushed dec10 skipdec10: bdns Reset skipreset l is_pushed Reset Setting bgtz is_pushed reset skipreset: update: bltz count reset s Counter Setting count s db Setting count j loop
inc1: add count count 1 j update
inc10: add count count 10 j update
dec1: sub count count 1 j update
dec10: sub count count 10 j update
reset: move count 0 j update
